recipe.title: Cinnamon Roll French Toast Bake Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: 2 tubes ; cinnamon roll, refrigerated, with icing

steps.step: Cut each cinnamon roll into 8 pieces.
In a separate bowl, whisk the eggs, milk, vanilla, and cinnamon. Set it aside.

Pour the butter on the bottom of a 9 X 13 inch (22cm x 33cm) glass baking dish. Spread the cinnamon roll pieces evenly over the butter. Then pour the mixture over the cinnamon rolls. Pour 1 cup of maple syrup over the mixture.
Top with the icing from the cinnamon rolls.

steps_updated.steps_updated: Cut each cinnamon roll into 8 pieces.
In a separate bowl, whisk the eggs, milk, vanilla, and cinnamon.
Pour the butter on the bottom of a 9 X 13 inch (22cm x 33cm) glass baking dish.
Spread the cinnamon roll pieces evenly over the butter.
Then pour the mixture over the cinnamon rolls.
Pour 1 cup of maple syrup over the mixture.
Top with the icing from the cinnamon rolls.
